name: Memrise D4
description: A dark, semi-minimal, flat theme for Memrise and Decks. Created by Hex - ヘクス
additional_info:
18 October 2019
A few artifacts remain here and there, but the style is now 'finished'. It will be updated should Memrise or Decks change their styles enough to break the theme.

-Theme now applies to Decks as well
-Removed WIP label

15 August 2019
-General improvements to learning screen and course browsing screen

13 April 2019
-Beta for Memrise's newly designed website

22 May 2018
- Fixed most of the styling for the courses section
- Fixed the site footer

31 October 2017
-Some changes, and adjustments to memrise's updates.

12 November 2017
-Removed Ziggy

24 Apr 2017:
-Adjusted for update & more small changes

18 Apr 2017:
-Many big changes
